text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.title: Realistic Sleep mod settings
text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.option.da: The HUD message that will be displayed to all players after sleeping through the night.
text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.option.bl: The amount loaded block entities' tick speed will be multiplied by per player sleeping.
text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.option.ch: The amount loaded chunks' tick speed will be multiplied by per player sleeping.
